      public byte[] getProfilePicBytes(User user)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      bytes of the profile picture

    • loadRecommendations

      @Async public void loadRecommendations(User user)
      Updates the recommendations of a given User. Recommendations for a certain user are the users followed by the users followed by the user.
      Parameters:
      user - User for which the recommendations are being generated.
